open a terminal, sudo apt-get install wine.
it will ask you for a password, just put in your normal user one. Then follow the prompts. It will install.
.. im new to ubuntu.. but why is my User Password the same as my SUDO password? is that normal?
yes, its just to stop you screwing over your system accidentally.
its cos wine needs admin rights to put stuff in the system folders, and as a normal user, you don't have them. Its just an extra security thing.
